title: Cristian Mora
text:
Cristian Rafael Mora Medrano (born August 26, 1979 in <a href="Vinces">Vinces</a>, <a href="Los%20R%C3%ADos%20Province">Los Ríos</a>) is a retired <a href="Ecuador">Ecuador</a>ian <a href="soccer">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>.
Club career.
Mora once attended Colegio de las Hermanas Betlemitas and first played in Cóndor Futbol Club of San Miguel as goalkeeper at an early age. He also played for the San Miguel's city team in the Provincial Games and was picked as goalkeeper for the province team to play the national teen/amateur championship in Ecuador. Mora was then discovered and invited to train in <a href="Centro%20Deportivo%20Olmedo">Olmedo</a>, while playing as goalkeeper in a friendly match against his college Escuela Politécnica de Riobamba.
On July 15, 2014, it was confirmed that Mora would go on loan to <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Premier%20League">Hong Kong Premier League</a> side <a href="South%20China%20AA">South China</a>.
International career.
Mora has made 20 appearances for the <a href="Ecuador%20national%20football%20team">Ecuadorian national team</a>, and made his first full-fledged senior appearance against <a href="Italy%20national%20football%20team">Italy</a>, a friendly match played in New Jersey. The game ended in a 1–1 draw and to Mora's credit, his penalty save from superstar <a href="Luca%20Toni">Luca Toni</a> forced many to take notice, including <a href="Luis%20Fernando%20Suarez">Luis Fernando Suarez</a>, Ecuador's former <a href="Colombia">Colombia</a>n coach.
He played first choice goalkeeper for the <a href="Ecuador%20national%20football%20team">Ecuador national team</a> during 2005's <a href="2006%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">2006 FIFA World Cup</a> qualification. In the 2006 World Cup, Mora played all four matches before his team was eliminated in the Round of 16 by <a href="England%20national%20football%20team">England</a>. Mora allowed 4 goals but kept clean sheets against <a href="Poland%20national%20football%20team">Poland</a> and <a href="Costa%20Rica%20national%20football%20team">Costa Rica</a>. However, due to poor friendly results and a bad <a href="Copa%20America%202007">Copa America 2007</a> he has failed to break with the national team.
